Summary: Bright light in a arc pattern
divs: Sighting DetailsJust got home from eating out. I was talking on my cell phone. I always watch the sky. I live near the local airport. (small planes etc,) I notice the light coming in, because I thought that a plane was coming in on a bad approach. The light was very bright, no noise. It made a turn from SE to a E direction. I watched it until it went past the tree line. A min. or so later for jets in pattern, flew from W to E in the direction of the object.
